entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
